#' Validate ORCID identifier format
2 
#'
3 
#' @description
4 
#' Checks if a string is a valid ORCID identifier. Valid ORCIDs follow the
5 
#' pattern XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX where X is a digit, and the last character
6 
#' can be a digit or X.
7 
#'
8 
#' @param orcid_id Character string to validate.
9 
#' @param stop_on_error Logical. If TRUE, stops with an error for invalid IDs.
10 
#'   If FALSE, returns FALSE for invalid IDs.
11 
#'
12 
#' @return Logical. TRUE if valid, FALSE if invalid (when stop_on_error = FALSE).
13 
#' @keywords internal
14 
#' @noRd
15 
#'
16 
#' @examples
17 
#' \dontrun{
18 
#' validate_orcid("0000-0002-1825-0097") # TRUE
19 
#' validate_orcid("0000-0002-1825-009X") # TRUE
20 
#' validate_orcid("invalid") # Error
21 
#' }
22 
validate_orcid <- function(orcid_id, stop_on_error = TRUE) {
23 16x 
  if (is.null(orcid_id) || length(orcid_id) == 0) {
24 1x 
    if (stop_on_error) {
25 1x 
      stop("ORCID identifier cannot be NULL or empty", call. = FALSE)
26 
    }
27 ! 
    return(FALSE)
28 
  }
29 

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    15x
                    
                      
  if (length(orcid_id) > 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    !
                    
                      
    if (stop_on_error) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    !
                    
                      
      stop("validate_orcid expects a single ORCID identifier", call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    !
                    
                      
    return(FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    15x
                    
                      
  if (!is.character(orcid_id)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    !
                    
                      
    if (stop_on_error) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    !
                    
                      
      stop("ORCID identifier must be a character string", call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    !
                    
                      
    return(FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
  # ORCID pattern: XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX where last char can be X

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    15x
                    
                      
  pattern <- "^[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{3}[0-9X]$"

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    15x
                    
                      
  is_valid <- grepl(pattern, orcid_id)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    15x
                    
                      
  if (!is_valid && stop_on_error) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    1x
                    
                      
    stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    1x
                    
                      
      "Invalid ORCID format: '",

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    1x
                    
                      
      orcid_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
      "'. ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    1x
                    
                      
      "Expected format: XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX (e.g., 0000-0002-1825-0097)",

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    1x
                    
                      
      call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    14x
                    
                      
  is_valid

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
}

                    62

#' Normalize ORCID identifier

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' Ensures ORCID identifier has proper formatting with dashes.

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' Handles ORCIDs provided with or without dashes, and with or without

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' the https://orcid.org/ prefix.

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. ORCID identifier.

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Character string with normalized ORCID (XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX format).

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#' normalize_orcid("0000000218250097") # "0000-0002-1825-0097"

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#' normalize_orcid("https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1825-0097") # "0000-0002-1825-0097"

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
normalize_orcid <- function(orcid_id) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    36x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(orcid_id) || length(orcid_id) != 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    1x
                    
                      
    stop("normalize_orcid expects a single ORCID identifier", call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
  # Remove URL prefix if present

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    35x
                    
                      
  orcid_id <- gsub("^https?://orcid\\.org/", "", orcid_id, ignore.case = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
  # Remove all dashes

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    35x
                    
                      
  clean_id <- gsub("-", "", orcid_id)

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
  # Check length

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    35x
                    
                      
  if (nchar(clean_id) != 16) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    29x
                    
                      
    stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    29x
                    
                      
      "Invalid ORCID length: '",

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    29x
                    
                      
      orcid_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
      "'. ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    29x
                    
                      
      "Expected 16 characters (digits or X)",

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    29x
                    
                      
      call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
  # Add dashes

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    6x
                    
                      
  formatted <- paste(

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    6x
                    
                      
    substr(clean_id, 1, 4),

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    6x
                    
                      
    substr(clean_id, 5, 8),

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    6x
                    
                      
    substr(clean_id, 9, 12),

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    6x
                    
                      
    substr(clean_id, 13, 16),

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    6x
                    
                      
    sep = "-"

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
  # Validate result

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    6x
                    
                      
  validate_orcid(formatted, stop_on_error = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    6x
                    
                      
  formatted

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
}

#' Extract value from nested list safely

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' Safely extracts a value from a nested list structure, returning NA if

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#' the path doesn't exist.

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x List. Nested list structure.

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... Character strings. Path to value.

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Extracted value or NA if path doesn't exist.

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
safe_extract <- function(x, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    470x
                    
                      
  path <- list(...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    470x
                    
                      
  result <- x

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    470x
                    
                      
  for (key in path) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    546x
                    
                      
    if (is.null(result) || !is.list(result) || !key %in% names(result)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    298x
                    
                      
      return(NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    248x
                    
                      
    result <- result[[key]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    172x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(result)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    7x
                    
                      
    return(NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    165x
                    
                      
  result

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
}

#' Convert ORCID date to ISO format

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#' Converts ORCID API date objects (with year, month, day components)

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#' to ISO date strings.

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#' @param date_obj List. Date object from ORCID API with year, month, day.

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Character string in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD) or NA.

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
orcid_date_to_iso <- function(date_obj) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    50x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(date_obj) || !is.list(date_obj)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    39x
                    
                      
    return(NA_character_)

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    11x
                    
                      
  year <- safe_extract(date_obj, "year", "value")

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    11x
                    
                      
  month <- safe_extract(date_obj, "month", "value")

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    11x
                    
                      
  day <- safe_extract(date_obj, "day", "value")

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    11x
                    
                      
  if (is.na(year)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    1x
                    
                      
    return(NA_character_)

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
  # Format with padding

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    10x
                    
                      
  year_str <- sprintf("%04d", as.integer(year))

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (is.na(month)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    3x
                    
                      
    return(year_str)

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    7x
                    
                      
  month_str <- sprintf("%02d", as.integer(month))

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    7x
                    
                      
  if (is.na(day)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    3x
                    
                      
    return(paste0(year_str, "-", month_str))

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    4x
                    
                      
  day_str <- sprintf("%02d", as.integer(day))

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    4x
                    
                      
  paste0(year_str, "-", month_str, "-", day_str)

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
}

#' Check if environment variable is set

#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
has_env_var <- function(var) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    2x
                    
                      
  val <- Sys.getenv(var, unset = "")

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    2x
                    
                      
  nchar(val) > 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
}

#' Fetch and parse ORCID endpoint

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
#' Helper function to reduce boilerplate in API endpoint functions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      
#' Validates ORCID, makes request, and applies parser function.

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    214

                    215
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. ORCID identifier.

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      
#' @param parser Function. Parser function to apply to response.

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token.

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... Additional arguments passed to parser function.

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Result of parser function.

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
fetch_and_parse <- function(endpoint, orcid_id, parser, token = NULL, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      
  # Normalize and validate ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    27x
                    
                      
  orcid_id <- normalize_orcid(orcid_id)

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    !
                    
                      
  validate_orcid(orcid_id, stop_on_error = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      
  # Make API request

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    !
                    
                      
  response <- orcid_request(

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    !
                    
                      
    endpoint = endpoint,

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    !
                    
                      
    orcid_id = orcid_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    !
                    
                      
    token = token,

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    !
                    
                      
    base_url = orcid_base_url()

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    
                    
                      
  # Parse and return

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    !
                    
                      
  parser(response, orcid_id, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    
                    
                      
}

#' Generic parser for affiliation-group structures

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Shared logic for parsing affiliation-based records (employments, educations, affiliations).

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' Reduces code duplication across multiple parsers.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param json_data List. Parsed JSON response from ORCID API.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. ORCID identifier (for reference).

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param summary_key Character string. The summary key to extract (e.g., "employment-summary").

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @return data.table with affiliation records.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
parse_affiliation_group <- function(json_data, orcid_id, summary_key) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    12x
                    
                      
  groups <- safe_extract(json_data, "affiliation-group")

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
  # Empty structure template

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    12x
                    
                      
  empty_structure <- data.table::data.table(

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    12x
                    
                      
    orcid = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    12x
                    
                      
    put_code = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    12x
                    
                      
    organization = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    12x
                    
                      
    department = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    12x
                    
                      
    role = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    12x
                    
                      
    start_date = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    12x
                    
                      
    end_date = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    12x
                    
                      
    city = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    12x
                    
                      
    region = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    12x
                    
                      
    country = character(0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    12x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(groups) || length(groups) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    4x
                    
                      
    return(empty_structure)

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  # Process each group

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    8x
                    
                      
  records <- lapply(groups, function(group) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    8x
                    
                      
    summaries <- safe_extract(group, "summaries")

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    8x
                    
                      
    if (is.null(summaries)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    !
                    
                      
      return(NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    8x
                    
                      
    lapply(summaries, function(item) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    8x
                    
                      
      summary <- safe_extract(item, summary_key)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    8x
                    
                      
      if (is.null(summary)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    !
                    
                      
        return(NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    8x
                    
                      
      list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    8x
                    
                      
        orcid = orcid_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    8x
                    
                      
        put_code = as.character(safe_extract(summary, "put-code")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    8x
                    
                      
        organization = safe_extract(summary, "organization", "name"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    8x
                    
                      
        department = safe_extract(summary, "department-name"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    8x
                    
                      
        role = safe_extract(summary, "role-title"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    8x
                    
                      
        start_date = orcid_date_to_iso(safe_extract(summary, "start-date")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    8x
                    
                      
        end_date = orcid_date_to_iso(safe_extract(summary, "end-date")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    8x
                    
                      
        city = safe_extract(summary, "organization", "address", "city"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    8x
                    
                      
        region = safe_extract(summary, "organization", "address", "region"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    8x
                    
                      
        country = safe_extract(summary, "organization", "address", "country")

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
    })

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
  })

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
  # Flatten and convert to data.table

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    8x
                    
                      
  records_flat <- unlist(records, recursive = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    8x
                    
                      
  records_flat <- records_flat[!vapply(records_flat, is.null, logical(1))]

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    8x
                    
                      
  if (length(records_flat) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    !
                    
                      
    return(empty_structure)

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    8x
                    
                      
  data.table::rbindlist(records_flat, fill = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
}

#' Parse works (publications) from ORCID API

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#' Converts works JSON response to normalized data.table.

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#' @param json_data List. Parsed JSON response from ORCID API.

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. ORCID identifier (for reference).

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#' @return data.table with work records.

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
parse_works <- function(json_data, orcid_id) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    6x
                    
                      
  groups <- safe_extract(json_data, "group")

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    6x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(groups) || length(groups) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    2x
                    
                      
    return(data.table::data.table(

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    2x
                    
                      
      orcid = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    2x
                    
                      
      put_code = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    2x
                    
                      
      title = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    2x
                    
                      
      type = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    2x
                    
                      
      publication_date = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    2x
                    
                      
      journal = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    2x
                    
                      
      doi = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    2x
                    
                      
      url = character(0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
    ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    4x
                    
                      
  records <- lapply(groups, function(group) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    4x
                    
                      
    summaries <- safe_extract(group, "work-summary")

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    4x
                    
                      
    if (is.null(summaries)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    !
                    
                      
      return(NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    4x
                    
                      
    lapply(summaries, function(summary) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    4x
                    
                      
      if (is.null(summary)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    !
                    
                      
        return(NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
      # Extract title

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    4x
                    
                      
      title <- safe_extract(summary, "title", "title", "value")

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
      # Extract DOI from external IDs

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    4x
                    
                      
      doi <- NA_character_

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    4x
                    
                      
      ext_ids <- safe_extract(summary, "external-ids", "external-id")

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    4x
                    
                      
      if (!is.null(ext_ids) && is.list(ext_ids)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    2x
                    
                      
        for (ext_id in ext_ids) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    4x
                    
                      
          if (

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    2x
                    
                      
            !is.null(ext_id) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    2x
                    
                      
              identical(safe_extract(ext_id, "external-id-type"), "doi")

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
          ) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    2x
                    
                      
            doi <- safe_extract(ext_id, "external-id-value")

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    2x
                    
                      
            break

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
          }

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
      # Extract URL

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    4x
                    
                      
      url <- safe_extract(summary, "url", "value")

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    4x
                    
                      
      list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    4x
                    
                      
        orcid = orcid_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    4x
                    
                      
        put_code = as.character(safe_extract(summary, "put-code")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    4x
                    
                      
        title = title,

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    4x
                    
                      
        type = safe_extract(summary, "type"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    4x
                    
                      
        publication_date = orcid_date_to_iso(safe_extract(

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    4x
                    
                      
          summary,

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    4x
                    
                      
          "publication-date"

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
        )),

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    4x
                    
                      
        journal = safe_extract(summary, "journal-title", "value"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    4x
                    
                      
        doi = doi,

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    4x
                    
                      
        url = url

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
    })

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
  })

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    4x
                    
                      
  records_flat <- unlist(records, recursive = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    4x
                    
                      
  records_flat <- records_flat[!vapply(records_flat, is.null, logical(1))]

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    4x
                    
                      
  if (length(records_flat) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    !
                    
                      
    return(data.table::data.table(

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    !
                    
                      
      put_code = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    !
                    
                      
      title = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    !
                    
                      
      type = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    !
                    
                      
      publication_date = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    !
                    
                      
      journal = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    !
                    
                      
      doi = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    !
                    
                      
      url = character(0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
    ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    4x
                    
                      
  data.table::rbindlist(records_flat, fill = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
#' Parse funding records from ORCID API

                    		
                  

                  

                    203

#' Converts funding JSON response to normalized data.table.

                    		
                  

                  

                    206

                    209

                    210
                    
                    
                      
#' @return data.table with funding records.

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
parse_funding <- function(json_data, orcid_id) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    5x
                    
                      
  groups <- safe_extract(json_data, "group")

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    5x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(groups) || length(groups) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    2x
                    
                      
    return(data.table::data.table(

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    2x
                    
                      
      orcid = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    2x
                    
                      
      put_code = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    2x
                    
                      
      title = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    2x
                    
                      
      type = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    2x
                    
                      
      organization = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    2x
                    
                      
      start_date = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    2x
                    
                      
      end_date = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    2x
                    
                      
      amount = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    2x
                    
                      
      currency = character(0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
    ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    3x
                    
                      
  records <- lapply(groups, function(group) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    3x
                    
                      
    summaries <- safe_extract(group, "funding-summary")

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    3x
                    
                      
    if (is.null(summaries)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    !
                    
                      
      return(NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    3x
                    
                      
    lapply(summaries, function(summary) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    3x
                    
                      
      if (is.null(summary)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    !
                    
                      
        return(NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      
      # Extract amount info

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    3x
                    
                      
      amount <- NA_character_

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    3x
                    
                      
      currency <- NA_character_

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    3x
                    
                      
      amount_obj <- safe_extract(summary, "amount")

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    3x
                    
                      
      if (!is.null(amount_obj) && is.list(amount_obj)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    !
                    
                      
        amount <- safe_extract(amount_obj, "value")

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    !
                    
                      
        currency <- safe_extract(amount_obj, "currency-code")

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    3x
                    
                      
      list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    3x
                    
                      
        orcid = orcid_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    3x
                    
                      
        put_code = as.character(safe_extract(summary, "put-code")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    3x
                    
                      
        title = safe_extract(summary, "title", "title", "value"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    3x
                    
                      
        type = safe_extract(summary, "type"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    3x
                    
                      
        organization = safe_extract(summary, "organization", "name"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    3x
                    
                      
        start_date = orcid_date_to_iso(safe_extract(summary, "start-date")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    3x
                    
                      
        end_date = orcid_date_to_iso(safe_extract(summary, "end-date")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    3x
                    
                      
        amount = amount,

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    3x
                    
                      
        currency = currency

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    
                    
                      
    })

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    
                    
                      
  })

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    3x
                    
                      
  records_flat <- unlist(records, recursive = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    3x
                    
                      
  records_flat <- records_flat[!vapply(records_flat, is.null, logical(1))]

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    3x
                    
                      
  if (length(records_flat) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    !
                    
                      
    return(data.table::data.table(

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    !
                    
                      
      put_code = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    !
                    
                      
      title = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    !
                    
                      
      type = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    !
                    
                      
      organization = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    !
                    
                      
      start_date = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    !
                    
                      
      end_date = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    !
                    
                      
      amount = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    !
                    
                      
      currency = character(0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    
                    
                      
    ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    3x
                    
                      
  data.table::rbindlist(records_flat, fill = TRUE)

}
