                    751
                    
                    
                      
parse_address <- function(json_data, orcid_id) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    752
                    3x
                    
                      
  addresses <- safe_extract(json_data, "address")

                    		
                  

                  

                    753
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    754
                    3x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(addresses) || length(addresses) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    755
                    1x
                    
                      
    return(data.table::data.table(

                    		
                  

                  

                    756
                    1x
                    
                      
      orcid = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    757
                    1x
                    
                      
      put_code = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    758
                    1x
                    
                      
      country = character(0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    759
                    
                    
                      
    ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    760
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    761
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    762
                    2x
                    
                      
  records <- lapply(addresses, function(addr) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    763
                    2x
                    
                      
    list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    764
                    2x
                    
                      
      orcid = orcid_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    765
                    2x
                    
                      
      put_code = as.character(safe_extract(addr, "put-code")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    766
                    2x
                    
                      
      country = safe_extract(addr, "country", "value")

                    		
                  

                  

                    767
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    768
                    
                    
                      
  })

                    		
                  

                  

                    769
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    770
                    2x
                    
                      
  data.table::rbindlist(records, fill = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    771
                    
                    
                      
}

#' Parse email from ORCID API

                    		
                  

                  

                    775
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    776
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    777
                    
                    
                      
#' Converts email endpoint JSON response to normalized data.table.

                    		
                  

                  

                    778
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    779
                    
                    
                      
#' @param json_data List. Parsed JSON response from ORCID API.

                    		
                  

                  

                    780
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. ORCID identifier (for reference).

                    		
                  

                  

                    781
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    782
                    
                    
                      
#' @return data.table with email addresses.

                    		
                  

                  

                    783
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    784
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    785
                    
                    
                      
parse_email <- function(json_data, orcid_id) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    786
                    3x
                    
                      
  emails <- safe_extract(json_data, "email")

                    		
                  

                  

                    787
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    788
                    3x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(emails) || length(emails) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    789
                    1x
                    
                      
    return(data.table::data.table(

                    		
                  

                  

                    790
                    1x
                    
                      
      orcid = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    791
                    1x
                    
                      
      email = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    792
                    1x
                    
                      
      verified = logical(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    793
                    1x
                    
                      
      primary = logical(0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    794
                    
                    
                      
    ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    795
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    796
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    797
                    2x
                    
                      
  records <- lapply(emails, function(email) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    798
                    2x
                    
                      
    list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    799
                    2x
                    
                      
      orcid = orcid_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    800
                    2x
                    
                      
      email = safe_extract(email, "email"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    801
                    2x
                    
                      
      verified = isTRUE(safe_extract(email, "verified")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    802
                    2x
                    
                      
      primary = isTRUE(safe_extract(email, "primary"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    803
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    804
                    
                    
                      
  })

                    		
                  

                  

                    805
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    806
                    2x
                    
                      
  data.table::rbindlist(records, fill = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    807
                    
                    
                      
}

#' Parse activities summary from ORCID API

                    812

                    813
                    
                    
                      
#' Converts activities endpoint JSON response to normalized named list.

                    		
                  

                  

                    814
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    815
                    
                    
                      
#' @param json_data List. Parsed JSON response from ORCID API.

                    		
                  

                  

                    816
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. ORCID identifier (for reference).

                    		
                  

                  

                    817
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    818

                    819
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    820
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    821
                    
                    
                      
parse_activities <- function(json_data, orcid_id) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    822
                    2x
                    
                      
  result <- list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    823
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    824
                    
                    
                      
  # Parse distinctions

                    		
                  

                  

                    825
                    2x
                    
                      
  distinctions_data <- safe_extract(json_data, "distinctions")

                    		
                  

                  

                    826
                    2x
                    
                      
  result$distinctions <- if (!is.null(distinctions_data)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    827
                    2x
                    
                      
    parse_affiliations(distinctions_data, orcid_id)

                    		
                  

                  

                    828
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    829
                    !
                    
                      
    data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    830
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    831
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    832
                    
                    
                      
  # Parse educations

                    		
                  

                  

                    833
                    2x
                    
                      
  educations_data <- safe_extract(json_data, "educations")

                    		
                  

                  

                    834
                    2x
                    
                      
  result$educations <- if (!is.null(educations_data)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    835
                    2x
                    
                      
    parse_educations(educations_data, orcid_id)

                    		
                  

                  

                    836
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    837
                    !
                    
                      
    data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    838
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    839
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    840
                    
                    
                      
  # Parse employments

                    		
                  

                  

                    841
                    2x
                    
                      
  employments_data <- safe_extract(json_data, "employments")

                    		
                  

                  

                    842
                    2x
                    
                      
  result$employments <- if (!is.null(employments_data)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    843
                    2x
                    
                      
    parse_employments(employments_data, orcid_id)

                    		
                  

                  

                    844
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    845
                    !
                    
                      
    data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    846
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    847
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    848
                    
                    
                      
  # Parse invited positions

                    		
                  

                  

                    849
                    2x
                    
                      
  invited_data <- safe_extract(json_data, "invited-positions")

                    		
                  

                  

                    850
                    2x
                    
                      
  result$invited_positions <- if (!is.null(invited_data)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    851
                    2x
                    
                      
    parse_affiliations(invited_data, orcid_id)

                    		
                  

                  

                    852
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    853
                    !
                    
                      
    data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    854

  # Parse memberships

                    2x
                    
                      
  result$memberships <- if (!is.null(memberships_data)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    859
                    2x
                    
                      
    parse_affiliations(memberships_data, orcid_id)

                    		
                  

                  

                    860

                    2x

                    876
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    878

  # Parse fundings

                    2x
                    
                      
  fundings_data <- safe_extract(json_data, "fundings")

  result$fundings <- if (!is.null(fundings_data)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    883
                    2x
                    
                      
    parse_funding(fundings_data, orcid_id)

                    		
                  

                  

                    884
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    !
                    
                      
    data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    886

                    888
                    
                    
                      
  # Parse peer reviews

                    		
                  

                  

                    889
                    2x
                    
                      
  peer_reviews_data <- safe_extract(json_data, "peer-reviews")

                    		
                  

                  

                    890
                    2x
                    
                      
  result$peer_reviews <- if (!is.null(peer_reviews_data)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    891
                    2x
                    
                      
    parse_peer_reviews(peer_reviews_data, orcid_id)

                    		
                  

                  

                    892
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    893
                    !
                    
                      
    data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    894
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    895
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    896
                    
                    
                      
  # Parse research resources

                    		
                  

                  

                    897
                    2x
                    
                      
  resources_data <- safe_extract(json_data, "research-resources")

                    		
                  

                  

                    898
                    2x
                    
                      
  result$research_resources <- if (!is.null(resources_data)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    899
                    2x
                    
                      
    parse_research_resources(resources_data, orcid_id)

                    		
                  

                  

                    900
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    901
                    !
                    
                      
    data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    902
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    903
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    904
                    
                    
                      
  # Parse works

                    		
                  

                  

                    905
                    2x
                    
                      
  works_data <- safe_extract(json_data, "works")

                    		
                  

                  

                    906
                    2x
                    
                      
  result$works <- if (!is.null(works_data)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    907
                    2x
                    
                      
    parse_works(works_data, orcid_id)

                    		
                  

                  

                    908
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    909
                    !
                    
                      
    data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    910
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    911
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    912
                    2x
                    
                      
  result

                    		
                  

                  

                    913
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    914
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    915
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    916
                    
                    
                      
#' Parse search results from ORCID API

                    		
                  

                  

                    917
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    918
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    919
                    
                    
                      
#' Converts search endpoint JSON response to normalized data.table.

                    		
                  

                  

                    920
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    921
                    
                    
                      
#' @param json_data List. Parsed JSON response from ORCID search API.

                    		
                  

                  

                    922
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    923
                    
                    
                      
#' @return data.table with search results columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    924
                    
                    
                      
#'   orcid_id, given_names, family_name, credit_name, other_names.

                    		
                  

                  

                    925
                    
                    
                      
#'   The 'found' attribute contains the total number of matches.

                    		
                  

                  

                    926
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    927
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    928
                    
                    
                      
parse_search_results <- function(json_data) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    929
                    
                    
                      
  # Extract total number of results

                    		
                  

                  

                    930
                    3x
                    
                      
  num_found <- safe_extract(json_data, "num-found")

                    		
                  

                  

                    931
                    3x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(num_found)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    932
                    !
                    
                      
    num_found <- 0L

                    		
                  

                  

                    933
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    934
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    935
                    
                    
                      
  # Extract results array

                    		
                  

                  

                    936
                    3x
                    
                      
  results <- safe_extract(json_data, "result")

                    		
                  

                  

                    937
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    938
                    
                    
                      
  # Handle empty results (safe_extract returns NA for null)

                    		
                  

                  

                    939
                    
                    
                      
  if (

                    		
                  

                  

                    940
                    3x
                    
                      
    is.null(results) ||

                    		
                  

                  

                    941
                    3x
                    
                      
      length(results) == 0 ||

                    		
                  

                  

                    942
                    3x
                    
                      
      (length(results) == 1 && is.na(results))

                    		
                  

                  

                    943
                    
                    
                      
  ) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    944
                    2x
                    
                      
    result <- data.table::data.table(

                    		
                  

                  

                    945
                    2x
                    
                      
      orcid_id = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    946
                    2x
                    
                      
      given_names = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    947
                    2x
                    
                      
      family_name = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    948
                    2x
                    
                      
      credit_name = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    949
                    2x
                    
                      
      other_names = list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    950
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    951
                    2x
                    
                      
    attr(result, "found") <- as.integer(num_found)

                    		
                  

                  

                    952
                    2x
                    
                      
    return(result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    953
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    954
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    955
                    
                    
                      
  # Parse each result

                    		
                  

                  

                    956
                    1x
                    
                      
  parsed <- lapply(results, function(item) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    957
                    
                    
                      
    # Extract ORCID identifier

                    		
                  

                  

                    958
                    1x
                    
                      
    orcid_path <- safe_extract(item, "orcid-identifier", "path")

                    		
                  

                  

                    959
                    1x
                    
                      
    orcid_id <- if (!is.null(orcid_path)) orcid_path else NA_character_

                    		
                  

                  

                    960
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    961
                    
                    
                      
    # Extract given names

                    		
                  

                  

                    962
                    1x
                    
                      
    given_names <- safe_extract(item, "given-names")

                    		
                  

                  

                    963
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (is.null(given_names)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    964
                    !
                    
                      
      given_names <- NA_character_

                    		
                  

                  

                    965
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    966
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    967
                    
                    
                      
    # Extract family name

                    		
                  

                  

                    968
                    1x
                    
                      
    family_name <- safe_extract(item, "family-names")

                    		
                  

                  

                    969
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (is.null(family_name)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    970
                    !
                    
                      
      family_name <- NA_character_

                    		
                  

                  

                    971
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    972
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    973
                    
                    
                      
    # Extract credit name

                    		
                  

                  

                    974
                    1x
                    
                      
    credit_names <- safe_extract(item, "credit-name")

                    		
                  

                  

                    975
                    1x
                    
                      
    credit_name <- if (!is.null(credit_names) && length(credit_names) > 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    976
                    1x
                    
                      
      credit_names[[1]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    977
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    978
                    1x
                    
                      
      NA_character_

                    		
                  

                  

                    979
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    980
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    981
                    
                    
                      
    # Extract other names

                    		
                  

                  

                    982
                    1x
                    
                      
    other_names_data <- safe_extract(item, "other-names")

                    		
                  

                  

                    983
                    1x
                    
                      
    other_names <- if (

                    		
                  

                  

                    984
                    1x
                    
                      
      !is.null(other_names_data) && length(other_names_data) > 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    985
                    
                    
                      
    ) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    986
                    1x
                    
                      
      other_names_data

                    		
                  

                  

                    987
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    988
                    !
                    
                      
      list(character(0))

                    		
                  

                  

                    989
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    990
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    991
                    1x
                    
                      
    list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    992
                    1x
                    
                      
      orcid_id = orcid_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    993
                    1x
                    
                      
      given_names = given_names,

                    		
                  

                  

                    994
                    1x
                    
                      
      family_name = family_name,

                    		
                  

                  

                    995
                    1x
                    
                      
      credit_name = credit_name,

                    		
                  

                  

                    996
                    1x
                    
                      
      other_names = other_names

                    		
                  

                  

                    997
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    998
                    
                    
                      
  })

                    		
                  

                  

                    999
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1000
                    
                    
                      
  # Combine into data.table

                    		
                  

                  

                    1001
                    1x
                    
                      
  result <- data.table::data.table(

                    		
                  

                  

                    1002
                    1x
                    
                      
    orcid_id = sapply(parsed, function(x) x$orcid_id),

                    		
                  

                  

                    1003
                    1x
                    
                      
    given_names = sapply(parsed, function(x) x$given_names),

                    		
                  

                  

                    1004
                    1x
                    
                      
    family_name = sapply(parsed, function(x) x$family_name),

                    		
                  

                  

                    1005
                    1x
                    
                      
    credit_name = sapply(parsed, function(x) x$credit_name),

                    		
                  

                  

                    1006
                    1x
                    
                      
    other_names = lapply(parsed, function(x) x$other_names)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1007
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    1008
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1009
                    
                    
                      
  # Add found attribute

                    		
                  

                  

                    1010
                    1x
                    
                      
  attr(result, "found") <- as.integer(num_found)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1011
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1012
                    1x
                    
                      
  result

                    		
                  

                  

                    1013
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve peer review activities from ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches peer review records for a given ORCID identifier from the ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' public API. Returns a structured data.table with peer review activities

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' including reviewer roles, review types, and organizations.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. A valid ORCID identifier in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for authenticated

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   requests. If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   Most public data is accessible without authentication.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table with the following columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{orcid}{ORCID identifier}

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{put_code}{Unique identifier for this peer review record}

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{reviewer_role}{Role of the reviewer (e.g., reviewer, editor)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{review_type}{Type of review (e.g., review, evaluation)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{review_completion_date}{Date the review was completed (ISO format)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{organization}{Name of the convening organization (e.g., journal, conference)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   Returns an empty data.table with the same structure if no peer review

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   records are found.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID public API endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/{orcid-id}/peer-reviews}

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' Peer review activities can include journal article reviews, conference paper

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' reviews, grant reviews, and other forms of scholarly evaluation.

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' The function respects ORCID API rate limits and includes appropriate

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' User-Agent headers identifying the orcidtr package.

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_works}}, \code{\link{orcid_funding}}, \code{\link{orcid_fetch_record}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch peer review records for a public ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' reviews <- orcid_peer_reviews("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' print(reviews)

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' # With authentication

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' Sys.setenv(ORCID_TOKEN = "your-token-here")

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' reviews <- orcid_peer_reviews("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
orcid_peer_reviews <- function(orcid_id, token = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    1x
                    
                      
  fetch_and_parse("peer-reviews", orcid_id, parse_peer_reviews, token)

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Search ORCID registry

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Search for ORCID profiles using Apache Solr query syntax. This function

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' provides direct access to the ORCID search API with full query capabilities.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param query Character string. Solr query string (e.g., "keyword:ecology",

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'   "family-name:Smith AND given-names:John"). If NULL, returns empty results.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param rows Integer. Number of results to return (default: 10, max: 1000).

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param start Integer. Starting position for pagination (default: 0).

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token. Most searches

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   work without authentication.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... Additional parameters passed to the API request.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table with columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{orcid_id}{ORCID identifier}

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{given_names}{Given name(s)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{family_name}{Family name}

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{credit_name}{Credit/published name}

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{other_names}{Alternative names (list column)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   Returns empty data.table if no results found.

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   The total number of matches is available as \code{attr(result, "found")}.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID search endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/search}

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' **Query Field Examples:**

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' \itemize{

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'   \item \code{family-name:Smith}

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'   \item \code{given-names:John}

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'   \item \code{keyword:ecology}

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'   \item \code{affiliation-org-name:Harvard}

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'   \item \code{digital-object-ids:10.1371/*}

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'   \item \code{email:*@example.org}

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' **Boolean Operators:**

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' Use AND, OR, NOT for complex queries:

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{"family-name:Smith AND affiliation-org-name:Harvard"}

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Search Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/integration-guide/searching-the-orcid-registry/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_search}} for a more user-friendly interface,

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_doi}} for DOI-specific searches

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' # Search by keyword

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' results <- orcid("keyword:ecology", rows = 20)

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' print(results)

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' attr(results, "found")  # Total number of matches

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' # Search by name

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#' results <- orcid("family-name:Fabbri AND given-names:Lorenzo")

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#' # Search by affiliation

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#' results <- orcid("affiliation-org-name:Stanford")

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' # Search by DOI

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' results <- orcid("digital-object-ids:10.1371/*")

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' # Pagination

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' page1 <- orcid("keyword:genomics", rows = 10, start = 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' page2 <- orcid("keyword:genomics", rows = 10, start = 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
orcid <- function(query = NULL, rows = 10, start = 0, token = NULL, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
  # Handle NULL query

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    !
                    
                      
  if (is.null(query) || query == "") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    !
                    
                      
    warning("No query provided, returning empty results", call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    !
                    
                      
    result <- data.table::data.table(

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid_id = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    !
                    
                      
      given_names = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    !
                    
                      
      family_name = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    !
                    
                      
      credit_name = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
      other_names = list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    !
                    
                      
    attr(result, "found") <- 0L

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    !
                    
                      
    return(result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
  # Validate parameters

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!is.numeric(rows) || rows < 1 || rows > 1000) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("rows must be between 1 and 1000", call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!is.numeric(start) || start < 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("start must be a non-negative integer", call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
  # Get token

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    !
                    
                      
  if (is.null(token)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
    token <- Sys.getenv("ORCID_TOKEN", unset = "")

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    !
                    
                      
    if (token == "") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    !
                    
                      
      token <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
  # Construct URL

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    !
                    
                      
  url <- paste0(orcid_base_url(), "/search")

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
  # Build request

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    !
                    
                      
  req <- httr2::request(url) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    !
                    
                      
    httr2::req_headers(

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    !
                    
                      
      Accept = "application/json",

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    !
                    
                      
      `User-Agent` = paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    !
                    
                      
        "orcidtr/",

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    !
                    
                      
        utils::packageVersion("orcidtr"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    !
                    
                      
        " (R package; https://github.com/lorenzoFabbri/orcidtr)"

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
    ) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    !
                    
                      
    httr2::req_url_query(

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    !
                    
                      
      q = query,

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    !
                    
                      
      rows = rows,

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    !
                    
                      
      start = start

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
  # Add authentication if token available

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(token) && nchar(token) > 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    !
                    
                      
    req <- req |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    !
                    
                      
      httr2::req_headers(Authorization = paste("Bearer", token))

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
  # Perform request

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    !
                    
                      
  resp <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
    {

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    !
                    
                      
      req |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    !
                    
                      
        httr2::req_retry(max_tries = 3, max_seconds = 10) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    !
                    
                      
        httr2::req_error(is_error = function(resp) FALSE) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    !
                    
                      
        httr2::req_perform()

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    !
                    
                      
    error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    !
                    
                      
      stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    !
                    
                      
        "Failed to connect to ORCID search API: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    !
                    
                      
        conditionMessage(e),

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    !
                    
                      
        call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
