  # Check for HTTP errors

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    !
                    
                      
  status <- httr2::resp_status(resp)

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    !
                    
                      
  if (status >= 400) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    !
                    
                      
    stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    !
                    
                      
      "ORCID search API request failed with status ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    !
                    
                      
      status,

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
      ": ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    !
                    
                      
      httr2::resp_status_desc(resp),

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    !
                    
                      
      call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
  # Parse JSON response

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    !
                    
                      
  json_data <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
    {

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    !
                    
                      
      body <- httr2::resp_body_string(resp)

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    !
                    
                      
      jsonlite::fromJSON(body, simplifyVector = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    !
                    
                      
    error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    !
                    
                      
      stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    !
                    
                      
        "Failed to parse ORCID search response: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    !
                    
                      
        conditionMessage(e),

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    !
                    
                      
        call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
  # Parse and return

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    !
                    
                      
  parse_search_results(json_data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
#' User-friendly ORCID search

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
#' Search for ORCID profiles using named parameters instead of Solr query

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
#' syntax. This function provides a more intuitive interface than \code{\link{orcid}}.

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
#' @param given_name Character string. Given (first) name to search for.

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
#' @param family_name Character string. Family (last) name to search for.

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
#' @param affiliation_org Character string. Organization name.

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
#' @param email Character string. Email address (supports wildcards like *@example.org).

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
#' @param keywords Character vector. One or more keywords to search for.

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
#' @param digital_object_ids Character string. DOI or DOI pattern.

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
#' @param other_name Character string. Alternative name.

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
#' @param credit_name Character string. Credit/published name.

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
#' @param rows Integer. Number of results to return (default: 10).

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
#' @param start Integer. Starting position for pagination (default: 0).

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token.

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... Additional parameters passed to \code{\link{orcid}}.

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table of search results (same structure as \code{\link{orcid}}).

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
#'   The total number of matches is available as \code{attr(result, "found")}.

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
#' This function constructs a Solr query from the provided parameters and

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
#' calls \code{\link{orcid}} internally. Multiple parameters are combined

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
#' with AND logic.

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
#' # Search by name

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
#' results <- orcid_search(

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
#'   family_name = "Fabbri",

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
#'   given_name = "Lorenzo"

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
#' # Search by affiliation

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    
                    
                      
#' results <- orcid_search(affiliation_org = "Stanford University")

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      
#' # Search by keywords

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
#' results <- orcid_search(keywords = c("machine learning", "genomics"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    
                    
                      
#' # Combine multiple criteria

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      
#' results <- orcid_search(

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
#'   family_name = "Smith",

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
#'   affiliation_org = "Harvard",

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
#'   rows = 20

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid}} for more flexible query syntax

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    
                    
                      
orcid_search <- function(

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    
                    
                      
  given_name = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    
                    
                      
  family_name = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      
  affiliation_org = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    
                    
                      
  email = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    
                    
                      
  keywords = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    
                    
                      
  digital_object_ids = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    
                    
                      
  other_name = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    
                    
                      
  credit_name = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      
  rows = 10,

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      
  start = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    
                    
                      
  token = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    
                    
                      
  ...

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    
                    
                      
) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    
                    
                      
  # Build query components

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    1x
                    
                      
  query_parts <- character(0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(given_name)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    !
                    
                      
    query_parts <- c(query_parts, paste0("given-names:", given_name))

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(family_name)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    !
                    
                      
    query_parts <- c(query_parts, paste0("family-name:", family_name))

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(affiliation_org)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    !
                    
                      
    query_parts <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    !
                    
                      
      query_parts,

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    !
                    
                      
      paste0("affiliation-org-name:", affiliation_org)

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(email)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    !
                    
                      
    query_parts <- c(query_parts, paste0("email:", email))

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(keywords)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    
                    
                      
    # Handle multiple keywords

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    !
                    
                      
    if (length(keywords) > 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    !
                    
                      
      kw_query <- paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    
                    
                      
        "(",

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    !
                    
                      
        paste(paste0("keyword:", keywords), collapse = " OR "),

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    
                    
                      
        ")"

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    !
                    
                      
      query_parts <- c(query_parts, kw_query)

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    !
                    
                      
      query_parts <- c(query_parts, paste0("keyword:", keywords))

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(digital_object_ids)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    !
                    
                      
    query_parts <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    !
                    
                      
      query_parts,

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    !
                    
                      
      paste0("digital-object-ids:", digital_object_ids)

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(other_name)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    !
                    
                      
    query_parts <- c(query_parts, paste0("other-names:", other_name))

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(credit_name)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    !
                    
                      
    query_parts <- c(query_parts, paste0("credit-name:", credit_name))

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    
                    
                      
  # Combine with AND

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (length(query_parts) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    1x
                    
                      
    warning(

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    1x
                    
                      
      "No search criteria provided, returning empty results",

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    1x
                    
                      
      call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    1x
                    
                      
    result <- data.table::data.table(

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    1x
                    
                      
      orcid_id = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    1x
                    
                      
      given_names = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    1x
                    
                      
      family_name = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    1x
                    
                      
      credit_name = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    1x
                    
                      
      other_names = list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    301
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    302
                    1x
                    
                      
    attr(result, "found") <- 0L

                    		
                  

                  

                    303
                    1x
                    
                      
    return(result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    304
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    305
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    306
                    !
                    
                      
  query <- paste(query_parts, collapse = " AND ")

                    		
                  

                  

                    307
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    308
                    
                    
                      
  # Call orcid() with constructed query

                    		
                  

                  

                    309
                    !
                    
                      
  orcid(

                    		
                  

                  

                    310
                    !
                    
                      
    query = query,

                    		
                  

                  

                    311
                    !
                    
                      
    rows = rows,

                    		
                  

                  

                    312
                    !
                    
                      
    start = start,

                    		
                  

                  

                    313
                    !
                    
                      
    token = token,

                    		
                  

                  

                    314
                    
                    
                      
    ...

                    		
                  

                  

                    315
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    316
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    317
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    318
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    319
                    
                    
                      
#' Search ORCID by DOI

                    		
                  

                  

                    320
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    321
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    322
                    
                    
                      
#' Search for ORCID profiles associated with specific DOIs. This is a

                    		
                  

                  

                    323
                    
                    
                      
#' convenience wrapper around \code{\link{orcid}} for DOI-based searches.

                    		
                  

                  

                    324
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    325
                    
                    
                      
#' @param dois Character vector. One or more DOIs to search for.

                    		
                  

                  

                    326
                    
                    
                      
#' @param fuzzy Logical. Use fuzzy matching for DOI search (default: FALSE).

                    		
                  

                  

                    327
                    
                    
                      
#'   Fuzzy matching allows partial DOI matches.

                    		
                  

                  

                    328
                    
                    
                      
#' @param rows Integer. Number of results per DOI (default: 10).

                    		
                  

                  

                    329
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token.

                    		
                  

                  

                    330
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    331
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A named list where each element corresponds to a DOI and contains

                    		
                  

                  

                    332
                    
                    
                      
#'   a data.table of search results. If only one DOI is provided, returns

                    		
                  

                  

                    333
                    
                    
                      
#'   the data.table directly. Empty data.tables are returned for DOIs with

                    		
                  

                  

                    334
                    
                    
                      
#'   no matches.

                    		
                  

                  

                    335
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    336
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    337
                    
                    
                      
#' This function searches the \code{digital-object-ids} field in the ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    338
                    
                    
                      
#' registry. When \code{fuzzy = TRUE}, wildcard matching is used to find

                    		
                  

                  

                    339
                    
                    
                      
#' partial DOI matches.

                    		
                  

                  

                    340
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    341
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    342
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    343
                    
                    
                      
#' # Search by single DOI

                    		
                  

                  

                    344
                    
                    
                      
#' results <- orcid_doi("10.1371/journal.pone.0025995")

                    		
                  

                  

                    345
                    
                    
                      
#' print(results)

                    		
                  

                  

                    346
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    347
                    
                    
                      
#' # Search by multiple DOIs

                    		
                  

                  

                    348
                    
                    
                      
#' dois <- c("10.1038/nature12373", "10.1126/science.1260419")

                    		
                  

                  

                    349
                    
                    
                      
#' results <- orcid_doi(dois)

                    		
                  

                  

                    350
                    
                    
                      
#' names(results)

                    		
                  

                  

                    351
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    352
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fuzzy search (partial DOI)

                    		
                  

                  

                    353
                    
                    
                      
#' results <- orcid_doi("10.1371/*", fuzzy = TRUE, rows = 20)

                    		
                  

                  

                    354
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    355
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    356
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    357
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid}}, \code{\link{orcid_search}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    358
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    359
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    360
                    
                    
                      
orcid_doi <- function(dois, fuzzy = FALSE, rows = 10, token = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    361
                    
                    
                      
  # Validate input

                    		
                  

                  

                    362
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(dois) || length(dois) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    363
                    1x
                    
                      
    stop("At least one DOI must be provided", call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    364
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    365
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    366
                    
                    
                      
  # Function to search single DOI

                    		
                  

                  

                    367
                    !
                    
                      
  search_doi <- function(doi) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    368
                    
                    
                      
    # Construct query

                    		
                  

                  

                    369
                    !
                    
                      
    if (fuzzy) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    370
                    
                    
                      
      # Add wildcard if not present and fuzzy matching requested

                    		
                  

                  

                    371
                    !
                    
                      
      if (!grepl("\\*", doi)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    372
                    !
                    
                      
        doi_query <- paste0('"', doi, '*"')

                    		
                  

                  

                    373
                    
                    
                      
      } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    374
                    !
                    
                      
        doi_query <- paste0('"', doi, '"')

                    		
                  

                  

                    375
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    376
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    377
                    !
                    
                      
      doi_query <- paste0('"', doi, '"')

                    		
                  

                  

                    378
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    379
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    380
                    !
                    
                      
    query <- paste0("digital-object-ids:", doi_query)

                    		
                  

                  

                    381
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    382
                    
                    
                      
    # Search

                    		
                  

                  

                    383
                    !
                    
                      
    tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    384
                    
                    
                      
      {

                    		
                  

                  

                    385
                    !
                    
                      
        orcid(query = query, rows = rows, token = token)

                    		
                  

                  

                    386
                    
                    
                      
      },

                    		
                  

                  

                    387
                    !
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    388
                    !
                    
                      
        warning(

                    		
                  

                  

                    389
                    !
                    
                      
          "Search failed for DOI ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    390
                    !
                    
                      
          doi,

                    		
                  

                  

                    391
                    
                    
                      
          ": ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    392
                    !
                    
                      
          conditionMessage(e),

                    		
                  

                  

                    393
                    !
                    
                      
          call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    394
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    395
                    
                    
                      
        # Return empty result

                    		
                  

                  

                    396
                    !
                    
                      
        result <- data.table::data.table(

                    		
                  

                  

                    397
                    !
                    
                      
          orcid_id = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    398
                    !
                    
                      
          given_names = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    399
                    !
                    
                      
          family_name = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    400
                    !
                    
                      
          credit_name = character(0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    401
                    !
                    
                      
          other_names = list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    402
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    403
                    !
                    
                      
        attr(result, "found") <- 0L

                    		
                  

                  

                    404
                    !
                    
                      
        result

                    		
                  

                  

                    405
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    406
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    407
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    408
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    409
                    
                    
                      
  # Search all DOIs

                    		
                  

                  

                    410
                    !
                    
                      
  results <- lapply(dois, search_doi)

                    		
                  

                  

                    411
                    !
                    
                      
  names(results) <- dois

                    		
                  

                  

                    412
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    413
                    
                    
                      
  # If single DOI, return data.table directly

                    		
                  

                  

                    414
                    !
                    
                      
  if (length(dois) == 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    415
                    !
                    
                      
    return(results[[1]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    416
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    417
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    418
                    
                    
                      
  # Otherwise return named list

                    		
                  

                  

                    419
                    !
                    
                      
  results

                    		
                  

                  

                    420
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve complete person data from ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches comprehensive personal information including name, biography,

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' keywords, researcher URLs, and other public profile data from an ORCID record.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. A valid ORCID identifier in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for authenticated

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   requests. If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   Most public data is accessible without authentication.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table with the following columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{orcid}{ORCID identifier}

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{given_names}{Given (first) name}

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{family_name}{Family (last) name}

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{credit_name}{Published/credit name (if provided)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{biography}{Biography text}

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{keywords}{Comma-separated research keywords}

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{researcher_urls}{Comma-separated professional URLs}

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{country}{Country of residence}

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   Returns a data.table with NA values for missing fields.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID public API endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/{orcid-id}/person}

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' This endpoint provides the most comprehensive biographical information in a

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' single request, including name, biography, keywords, URLs, addresses, emails,

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' and external identifiers.

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_bio}}, \code{\link{orcid_keywords}}, \code{\link{orcid_researcher_urls}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch complete person data

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' person <- orcid_person("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' print(person)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' # Access specific fields

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' person$biography

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' person$keywords

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' # With authentication

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' Sys.setenv(ORCID_TOKEN = "your-token-here")

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' person <- orcid_person("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
orcid_person <- function(orcid_id, token = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    2x
                    
                      
  fetch_and_parse("person", orcid_id, parse_person, token)

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve biography from ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches just the biography/about text for an ORCID record. This is a

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' simplified alternative to \code{\link{orcid_person}} when you only need

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' the biography text.

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. A valid ORCID identifier in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for authenticated

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#'   requests. If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table with the following columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{orcid}{ORCID identifier}

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{biography}{Biography text}

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{visibility}{Visibility setting (public, limited, private)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#'   Returns a data.table with NA biography if not available.

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID public API endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/{orcid-id}/biography}

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_person}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch biography only

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#' bio <- orcid_bio("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#' print(bio$biography)

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
orcid_bio <- function(orcid_id, token = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    1x
                    
                      
  fetch_and_parse("biography", orcid_id, parse_bio, token)

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve keywords from ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches research keywords associated with an ORCID record. Keywords help

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#' identify research areas and interests.

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. A valid ORCID identifier in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for authenticated

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#'   requests. If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table with the following columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{orcid}{ORCID identifier}

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{put_code}{Unique identifier for this keyword}

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{keyword}{Keyword text}

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#'   Returns an empty data.table with the same structure if no keywords

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#'   are found.

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID public API endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/{orcid-id}/keywords}

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_person}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch keywords

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
#' keywords <- orcid_keywords("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
#' print(keywords)

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
orcid_keywords <- function(orcid_id, token = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    1x
                    
                      
  fetch_and_parse("keywords", orcid_id, parse_keywords, token)

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve researcher URLs from ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches professional and personal URLs associated with an ORCID record,

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#' such as personal websites, institutional profiles, social media, etc.

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. A valid ORCID identifier in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for authenticated

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#'   requests. If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table with the following columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{orcid}{ORCID identifier}

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{put_code}{Unique identifier for this URL}

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{url_name}{Name/label for the URL}
