                    163
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{url_value}{The actual URL}

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
#'   Returns an empty data.table with the same structure if no URLs

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
#'   are found.

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID public API endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/{orcid-id}/researcher-urls}

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_person}}, \code{\link{orcid_external_identifiers}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch researcher URLs

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
#' urls <- orcid_researcher_urls("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
#' print(urls)

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
orcid_researcher_urls <- function(orcid_id, token = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    1x
                    
                      
  fetch_and_parse("researcher-urls", orcid_id, parse_researcher_urls, token)

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve external identifiers from ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches external identifier mappings for an ORCID record, such as Scopus

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
#' Author ID, ResearcherID, Loop profile, and other researcher identification

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
#' systems.

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. A valid ORCID identifier in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for authenticated

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
#'   requests. If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table with the following columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{orcid}{ORCID identifier}

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{put_code}{Unique identifier for this external ID}

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{external_id_type}{Type of external identifier (e.g., "Scopus Author ID")}

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{external_id_value}{The identifier value}

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{external_id_url}{URL to the external profile (if available)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
#'   Returns an empty data.table with the same structure if no external

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      
#'   identifiers are found.

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID public API endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/{orcid-id}/external-identifiers}

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_person}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch external identifiers

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
#' ext_ids <- orcid_external_identifiers("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      
#' print(ext_ids)

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    
                    
                      
orcid_external_identifiers <- function(orcid_id, token = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    1x
                    
                      
  fetch_and_parse(

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    1x
                    
                      
    "external-identifiers",

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    1x
                    
                      
    orcid_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    1x
                    
                      
    parse_external_identifiers,

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    1x
                    
                      
    token

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve other names from ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches alternative names (also known as, published as, etc.) associated

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    
                    
                      
#' with an ORCID record.

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. A valid ORCID identifier in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for authenticated

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    
                    
                      
#'   requests. If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table with the following columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{orcid}{ORCID identifier}

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{put_code}{Unique identifier for this name}

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{other_name}{Alternative name}

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    
                    
                      
#'   Returns an empty data.table with the same structure if no other names

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    
                    
                      
#'   are found.

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID public API endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/{orcid-id}/other-names}

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_person}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch other names

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    
                    
                      
#' other_names <- orcid_other_names("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    
                    
                      
#' print(other_names)

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    
                    
                      
orcid_other_names <- function(orcid_id, token = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    1x
                    
                      
  fetch_and_parse("other-names", orcid_id, parse_other_names, token)

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve address information from ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches address/country information associated with an ORCID record.

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. A valid ORCID identifier in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for authenticated

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    
                    
                      
#'   requests. If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table with the following columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{orcid}{ORCID identifier}

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{put_code}{Unique identifier for this address}

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{country}{Country code}

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    301
                    
                    
                      
#'   Returns an empty data.table with the same structure if no address

                    		
                  

                  

                    302
                    
                    
                      
#'   information is found.

                    		
                  

                  

                    303
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    304
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    305
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID public API endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    306
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/{orcid-id}/address}

                    		
                  

                  

                    307
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    308
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    309
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    310
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    311
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    312
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_person}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    313
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    314
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    315
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    316
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch address information

                    		
                  

                  

                    317
                    
                    
                      
#' address <- orcid_address("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    318
                    
                    
                      
#' print(address)

                    		
                  

                  

                    319
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    320
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    321
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    322
                    
                    
                      
orcid_address <- function(orcid_id, token = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    323
                    1x
                    
                      
  fetch_and_parse("address", orcid_id, parse_address, token)

                    		
                  

                  

                    324
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    325
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    326
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    327
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve email information from ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    328
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    329
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    330
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches email addresses associated with an ORCID record. Note that email

                    		
                  

                  

                    331
                    
                    
                      
#' addresses are typically private and require authentication to access.

                    		
                  

                  

                    332
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    333
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. A valid ORCID identifier in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    334
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    335
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. API token for authenticated requests.

                    		
                  

                  

                    336
                    
                    
                      
#'   If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable. Email

                    		
                  

                  

                    337
                    
                    
                      
#'   addresses usually require authentication.

                    		
                  

                  

                    338
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    339
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table with the following columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    340
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    341
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{orcid}{ORCID identifier}

                    		
                  

                  

                    342
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{email}{Email address}

                    		
                  

                  

                    343
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{primary}{Logical indicating if this is the primary email}

                    		
                  

                  

                    344
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{verified}{Logical indicating if the email is verified}

                    		
                  

                  

                    345
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{visibility}{Visibility setting}

                    		
                  

                  

                    346
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    347
                    
                    
                      
#'   Returns an empty data.table with the same structure if no emails

                    		
                  

                  

                    348
                    
                    
                      
#'   are found or accessible.

                    		
                  

                  

                    349
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    350
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    351
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID public API endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    352
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/{orcid-id}/email}

                    		
                  

                  

                    353
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    354
                    
                    
                      
#' Email addresses are typically private and will only be returned if you have

                    		
                  

                  

                    355
                    
                    
                      
#' appropriate authentication permissions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    356
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    357
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    358
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    359
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    360
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    361
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_person}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    362
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    363
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    364
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    365
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch email (requires authentication)

                    		
                  

                  

                    366
                    
                    
                      
#' Sys.setenv(ORCID_TOKEN = "your-token-here")

                    		
                  

                  

                    367
                    
                    
                      
#' email <- orcid_email("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    368
                    
                    
                      
#' print(email)

                    		
                  

                  

                    369
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    370
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    371
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    372
                    
                    
                      
orcid_email <- function(orcid_id, token = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    373
                    1x
                    
                      
  fetch_and_parse("email", orcid_id, parse_email, token)

                    		
                  

                  

                    374
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve complete ORCID record

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches all public data for a given ORCID identifier, including employments,

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' education, works, funding, and peer reviews. Returns a named list of

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' data.table objects.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. A valid ORCID identifier in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for authenticated

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   requests. If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   Most public data is accessible without authentication.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param sections Character vector. Sections to fetch. Default is the most

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   commonly used sections: c("employments", "educations", "works", "funding",

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   "peer-reviews"). Available sections are:

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   \itemize{

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item Affiliations: "employments", "educations", "distinctions",

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'       "invited-positions", "memberships", "qualifications", "services",

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'       "research-resources"

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item Activities: "works", "funding", "peer-reviews"

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item Biographical: "person", "bio", "keywords", "researcher-urls",

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'       "external-identifiers", "other-names", "address", "email"

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   You can specify a subset to fetch only specific sections.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A named list with the following possible elements (each a data.table):

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{employments}{Employment history}

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{educations}{Education history}

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{distinctions}{Distinctions and honors}

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{invited_positions}{Invited positions}

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{memberships}{Professional memberships}

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{qualifications}{Qualifications}

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{services}{Service activities}

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{research_resources}{Research resources}

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{works}{Works/publications}

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{funding}{Funding records}

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{peer_reviews}{Peer review activities}

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{person}{Complete person data}

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{bio}{Biography}

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{keywords}{Keywords}

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{researcher_urls}{Researcher URLs}

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{external_identifiers}{External identifiers}

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{other_names}{Other names}

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{address}{Address information}

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{email}{Email addresses}

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'   Empty data.tables are returned for sections with no data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' This is a convenience function that calls individual API functions for each

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' section. Each section requires a separate API request.

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' To minimize API calls, specify only the sections you need using the

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{sections} parameter.

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_fetch_many}}, \code{\link{orcid_employments}}, \code{\link{orcid_works}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch complete record for a public ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' record <- orcid_fetch_record("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' names(record)

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' record$works

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' record$employments

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch only works and funding

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' record <- orcid_fetch_record(

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#'   "0000-0002-1825-0097",

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#'   sections = c("works", "funding")

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#' # With authentication

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#' Sys.setenv(ORCID_TOKEN = "your-token-here")

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#' record <- orcid_fetch_record("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
orcid_fetch_record <- function(

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
  orcid_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
  token = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
  sections = c("employments", "educations", "works", "funding", "peer-reviews")

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
  # Normalize and validate ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    2x
                    
                      
  orcid_id <- normalize_orcid(orcid_id)

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    1x
                    
                      
  validate_orcid(orcid_id, stop_on_error = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
  # Validate sections

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    1x
                    
                      
  valid_sections <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
    # Affiliations

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    1x
                    
                      
    "employments",

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    1x
                    
                      
    "educations",

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    1x
                    
                      
    "distinctions",

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    1x
                    
                      
    "invited-positions",

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    1x
                    
                      
    "memberships",

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    1x
                    
                      
    "qualifications",

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    1x
                    
                      
    "services",

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    1x
                    
                      
    "research-resources",

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
    # Works and activities

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    1x
                    
                      
    "works",

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    1x
                    
                      
    "funding",

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    1x
                    
                      
    "peer-reviews",

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
    # Person/biographical

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    1x
                    
                      
    "person",

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    1x
                    
                      
    "bio",

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    1x
                    
                      
    "keywords",

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    1x
                    
                      
    "researcher-urls",

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    1x
                    
                      
    "external-identifiers",

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    1x
                    
                      
    "other-names",

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    1x
                    
                      
    "address",

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    1x
                    
                      
    "email"

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    1x
                    
                      
  invalid <- setdiff(sections, valid_sections)

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (length(invalid) > 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    1x
                    
                      
    stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    1x
                    
                      
      "Invalid section(s): ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    1x
                    
                      
      paste(invalid, collapse = ", "),

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
      ". ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    1x
                    
                      
      "Valid sections are: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    1x
                    
                      
      paste(valid_sections, collapse = ", "),

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    1x
                    
                      
      call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
  # Initialize result list

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    !
                    
                      
  result <- list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
  # Fetch each requested section

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    !
                    
                      
  if ("employments" %in% sections) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    !
                    
                      
    result$employments <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid_employments(orcid_id, token = token),

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    !
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    !
                    
                      
        warning(

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    !
                    
                      
          "Failed to fetch employments: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    !
                    
                      
          conditionMessage(e),

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    !
                    
                      
          call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    !
                    
                      
        data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    !
                    
                      
  if ("educations" %in% sections) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    !
                    
                      
    result$educations <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid_educations(orcid_id, token = token),

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    !
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    !
                    
                      
        warning(

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    !
                    
                      
          "Failed to fetch educations: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    !
                    
                      
          conditionMessage(e),

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    !
                    
                      
          call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    !
                    
                      
        data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    !
                    
                      
  if ("works" %in% sections) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    !
                    
                      
    result$works <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid_works(orcid_id, token = token),

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    !
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    !
                    
                      
        warning("Failed to fetch works: ", conditionMessage(e), call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    !
                    
                      
        data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    !
                    
                      
  if ("funding" %in% sections) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    !
                    
                      
    result$funding <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid_funding(orcid_id, token = token),

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    !
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    !
                    
                      
        warning("Failed to fetch funding: ", conditionMessage(e), call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    !
                    
                      
        data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    !
                    
                      
  if ("peer-reviews" %in% sections) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    !
                    
                      
    result$peer_reviews <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid_peer_reviews(orcid_id, token = token),

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    !
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    !
                    
                      
        warning(

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    !
                    
                      
          "Failed to fetch peer reviews: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    !
                    
                      
          conditionMessage(e),

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    !
                    
                      
          call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    !
                    
                      
        data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
  # Professional activities

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    !
                    
                      
  if ("distinctions" %in% sections) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    !
                    
                      
    result$distinctions <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid_distinctions(orcid_id, token = token),

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    !
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    !
                    
                      
        warning(

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    !
                    
                      
          "Failed to fetch distinctions: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    !
                    
                      
          conditionMessage(e),

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    !
                    
                      
          call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    !
                    
                      
        data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    !
                    
                      
  if ("invited-positions" %in% sections) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    !
                    
                      
    result$invited_positions <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid_invited_positions(orcid_id, token = token),

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    !
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    !
                    
                      
        warning(

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    !
                    
                      
          "Failed to fetch invited positions: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    !
                    
                      
          conditionMessage(e),

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    !
                    
                      
          call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    !
                    
                      
        data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
  }
