                    223
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    !
                    
                      
  if ("memberships" %in% sections) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    !
                    
                      
    result$memberships <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid_memberships(orcid_id, token = token),

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    !
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    !
                    
                      
        warning(

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    !
                    
                      
          "Failed to fetch memberships: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    !
                    
                      
          conditionMessage(e),

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    !
                    
                      
          call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    !
                    
                      
        data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    !
                    
                      
  if ("qualifications" %in% sections) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    !
                    
                      
    result$qualifications <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid_qualifications(orcid_id, token = token),

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    !
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    !
                    
                      
        warning(

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    !
                    
                      
          "Failed to fetch qualifications: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    !
                    
                      
          conditionMessage(e),

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    !
                    
                      
          call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    !
                    
                      
        data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    !
                    
                      
  if ("services" %in% sections) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    !
                    
                      
    result$services <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid_services(orcid_id, token = token),

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    !
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    !
                    
                      
        warning(

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    !
                    
                      
          "Failed to fetch services: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    !
                    
                      
          conditionMessage(e),

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    !
                    
                      
          call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    !
                    
                      
        data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    !
                    
                      
  if ("research-resources" %in% sections) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    !
                    
                      
    result$research_resources <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid_research_resources(orcid_id, token = token),

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    !
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    !
                    
                      
        warning(

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    !
                    
                      
          "Failed to fetch research resources: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    !
                    
                      
          conditionMessage(e),

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    !
                    
                      
          call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    !
                    
                      
        data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    
                    
                      
  # Biographical data

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    !
                    
                      
  if ("person" %in% sections) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    !
                    
                      
    result$person <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid_person(orcid_id, token = token),

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    !
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    !
                    
                      
        warning("Failed to fetch person: ", conditionMessage(e), call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    !
                    
                      
        data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    !
                    
                      
  if ("bio" %in% sections) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    !
                    
                      
    result$bio <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid_bio(orcid_id, token = token),

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    !
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    !
                    
                      
        warning("Failed to fetch bio: ", conditionMessage(e), call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    !
                    
                      
        data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    301
                    !
                    
                      
  if ("keywords" %in% sections) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    302
                    !
                    
                      
    result$keywords <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    303
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid_keywords(orcid_id, token = token),

                    		
                  

                  

                    304
                    !
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    305
                    !
                    
                      
        warning(

                    		
                  

                  

                    306
                    !
                    
                      
          "Failed to fetch keywords: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    307
                    !
                    
                      
          conditionMessage(e),

                    		
                  

                  

                    308
                    !
                    
                      
          call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    309
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    310
                    !
                    
                      
        data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    311
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    312
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    313
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    314
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    315
                    !
                    
                      
  if ("researcher-urls" %in% sections) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    316
                    !
                    
                      
    result$researcher_urls <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    317
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid_researcher_urls(orcid_id, token = token),

                    		
                  

                  

                    318
                    !
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    319
                    !
                    
                      
        warning(

                    		
                  

                  

                    320
                    !
                    
                      
          "Failed to fetch researcher URLs: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    321
                    !
                    
                      
          conditionMessage(e),

                    		
                  

                  

                    322
                    !
                    
                      
          call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    323
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    324
                    !
                    
                      
        data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    325
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    326
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    327
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    328
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    329
                    !
                    
                      
  if ("external-identifiers" %in% sections) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    330
                    !
                    
                      
    result$external_identifiers <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    331
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid_external_identifiers(orcid_id, token = token),

                    		
                  

                  

                    332
                    !
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    333
                    !
                    
                      
        warning(

                    		
                  

                  

                    334
                    !
                    
                      
          "Failed to fetch external identifiers: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    335
                    !
                    
                      
          conditionMessage(e),

                    		
                  

                  

                    336
                    !
                    
                      
          call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    337
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    338
                    !
                    
                      
        data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    339
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    340
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    341
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    342
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    343
                    !
                    
                      
  if ("other-names" %in% sections) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    344
                    !
                    
                      
    result$other_names <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    345
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid_other_names(orcid_id, token = token),

                    		
                  

                  

                    346
                    !
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    347
                    !
                    
                      
        warning(

                    		
                  

                  

                    348
                    !
                    
                      
          "Failed to fetch other names: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    349
                    !
                    
                      
          conditionMessage(e),

                    		
                  

                  

                    350
                    !
                    
                      
          call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    351
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    352
                    !
                    
                      
        data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    353
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    354
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    355
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    356
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    357
                    !
                    
                      
  if ("address" %in% sections) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    358
                    !
                    
                      
    result$address <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    359
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid_address(orcid_id, token = token),

                    		
                  

                  

                    360
                    !
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    361
                    !
                    
                      
        warning("Failed to fetch address: ", conditionMessage(e), call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    362
                    !
                    
                      
        data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    363
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    364
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    365
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    366
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    367
                    !
                    
                      
  if ("email" %in% sections) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    368
                    !
                    
                      
    result$email <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    369
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid_email(orcid_id, token = token),

                    		
                  

                  

                    370
                    !
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    371
                    !
                    
                      
        warning("Failed to fetch email: ", conditionMessage(e), call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    372
                    !
                    
                      
        data.table::data.table()

                    		
                  

                  

                    373
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    374
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    375
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    376
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    377
                    !
                    
                      
  result

                    		
                  

                  

                    378
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    379
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    380
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    381
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve records for multiple ORCID identifiers

                    		
                  

                  

                    382
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    383
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    384
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches data for multiple ORCID identifiers. This is a convenience function

                    		
                  

                  

                    385
                    
                    
                      
#' that loops over a vector of ORCID iDs and fetches the specified section(s)

                    		
                  

                  

                    386
                    
                    
                      
#' for each. Results are combined into a single data.table.

                    		
                  

                  

                    387
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    388
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_ids Character vector. Valid ORCID identifiers in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    389
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    390
                    
                    
                      
#' @param section Character string. Section to fetch. One of: "employments",

                    		
                  

                  

                    391
                    
                    
                      
#'   "educations", "distinctions", "invited-positions", "memberships",

                    		
                  

                  

                    392
                    
                    
                      
#'   "qualifications", "services", "research-resources", "works", "funding",

                    		
                  

                  

                    393
                    
                    
                      
#'   or "peer-reviews".

                    		
                  

                  

                    394
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for authenticated

                    		
                  

                  

                    395
                    
                    
                      
#'   requests. If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    396
                    
                    
                      
#' @param stop_on_error Logical. If TRUE, stops on the first error. If FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    397
                    
                    
                      
#'   (default), continues processing and returns results for successful requests,

                    		
                  

                  

                    398
                    
                    
                      
#'   issuing warnings for failures.

                    		
                  

                  

                    399
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    400
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table combining results from all successful requests. The

                    		
                  

                  

                    401
                    
                    
                      
#'   orcid column identifies which ORCID each row belongs to.

                    		
                  

                  

                    402
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    403
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    404
                    
                    
                      
#' This function makes one API request per ORCID identifier. Be mindful of

                    		
                  

                  

                    405
                    
                    
                      
#' rate limits when fetching data for many ORCIDs.

                    		
                  

                  

                    406
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    407
                    
                    
                      
#' The function validates each ORCID identifier and normalizes formats before

                    		
                  

                  

                    408
                    
                    
                      
#' making requests.

                    		
                  

                  

                    409
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    410
                    
                    
                      
#' For rate limit compliance, consider adding delays between large batches

                    		
                  

                  

                    411
                    
                    
                      
#' or using authenticated requests which typically have higher rate limits.

                    		
                  

                  

                    412
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    413
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    414
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    415
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    416
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    417
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_fetch_record}}, \code{\link{orcid_works}}, \code{\link{orcid_employments}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    418
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    419
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    420
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    421
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch works for multiple ORCIDs

                    		
                  

                  

                    422
                    
                    
                      
#' orcids <- c("0000-0002-1825-0097", "0000-0003-1419-2405")

                    		
                  

                  

                    423
                    
                    
                      
#' works <- orcid_fetch_many(orcids, section = "works")

                    		
                  

                  

                    424
                    
                    
                      
#' print(works)

                    		
                  

                  

                    425
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    426
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch employments for multiple ORCIDs

                    		
                  

                  

                    427
                    
                    
                      
#' employments <- orcid_fetch_many(orcids, section = "employments")

                    		
                  

                  

                    428
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    429
                    
                    
                      
#' # Stop on first error

                    		
                  

                  

                    430
                    
                    
                      
#' works <- orcid_fetch_many(orcids, section = "works", stop_on_error = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    431
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    432
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    433
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    434
                    
                    
                      
orcid_fetch_many <- function(

                    		
                  

                  

                    435
                    
                    
                      
  orcid_ids,

                    		
                  

                  

                    436
                    
                    
                      
  section = "works",

                    		
                  

                  

                    437
                    
                    
                      
  token = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    438
                    
                    
                      
  stop_on_error = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    439
                    
                    
                      
) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    440
                    
                    
                      
  # Validate section

                    		
                  

                  

                    441
                    !
                    
                      
  valid_sections <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    442
                    !
                    
                      
    "employments",

                    		
                  

                  

                    443
                    !
                    
                      
    "educations",

                    		
                  

                  

                    444
                    !
                    
                      
    "distinctions",

                    		
                  

                  

                    445
                    !
                    
                      
    "invited-positions",

                    		
                  

                  

                    446
                    !
                    
                      
    "memberships",

                    		
                  

                  

                    447
                    !
                    
                      
    "qualifications",

                    		
                  

                  

                    448
                    !
                    
                      
    "services",

                    		
                  

                  

                    449
                    !
                    
                      
    "research-resources",

                    		
                  

                  

                    450
                    !
                    
                      
    "works",

                    		
                  

                  

                    451
                    !
                    
                      
    "funding",

                    		
                  

                  

                    452
                    !
                    
                      
    "peer-reviews"

                    		
                  

                  

                    453
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    454
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!section %in% valid_sections) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    455
                    !
                    
                      
    stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    456
                    !
                    
                      
      "Invalid section: '",

                    		
                  

                  

                    457
                    !
                    
                      
      section,

                    		
                  

                  

                    458
                    
                    
                      
      "'. ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    459
                    !
                    
                      
      "Valid sections are: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    460
                    !
                    
                      
      paste(valid_sections, collapse = ", "),

                    		
                  

                  

                    461
                    !
                    
                      
      call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    462
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    463
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    464
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    465
                    !
                    
                      
  if (length(orcid_ids) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    466
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("orcid_ids cannot be empty", call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    467
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    468
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    469
                    
                    
                      
  # Normalize all ORCIDs first

                    		
                  

                  

                    470
                    !
                    
                      
  orcid_ids <- vapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    471
                    !
                    
                      
    orcid_ids,

                    		
                  

                  

                    472
                    !
                    
                      
    function(id) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    473
                    !
                    
                      
      tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    474
                    !
                    
                      
        normalize_orcid(id),

                    		
                  

                  

                    475
                    !
                    
                      
        error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    476
                    !
                    
                      
          if (stop_on_error) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    477
                    !
                    
                      
            stop(conditionMessage(e), call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    478
                    
                    
                      
          }

                    		
                  

                  

                    479
                    !
                    
                      
          warning(

                    		
                  

                  

                    480
                    !
                    
                      
            "Invalid ORCID: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    481
                    !
                    
                      
            id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    482
                    
                    
                      
            " - ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    483
                    !
                    
                      
            conditionMessage(e),

                    		
                  

                  

                    484
                    !
                    
                      
            call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    485
                    
                    
                      
          )

                    		
                  

                  

                    486
                    !
                    
                      
          NA_character_

                    		
                  

                  

                    487
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    488
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    489
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    490
                    !
                    
                      
    character(1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    491
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    492
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    493
                    
                    
                      
  # Remove invalid ORCIDs

                    		
                  

                  

                    494
                    !
                    
                      
  orcid_ids <- orcid_ids[!is.na(orcid_ids)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    495
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    496
                    !
                    
                      
  if (length(orcid_ids) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    497
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("No valid ORCID identifiers provided", call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    498
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    499
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    500
                    
                    
                      
  # Select appropriate function

                    		
                  

                  

                    501
                    !
                    
                      
  fetch_fn <- switch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    502
                    !
                    
                      
    section,

                    		
                  

                  

                    503
                    !
                    
                      
    "employments" = orcid_employments,

                    		
                  

                  

                    504
                    !
                    
                      
    "educations" = orcid_educations,

                    		
                  

                  

                    505
                    !
                    
                      
    "distinctions" = orcid_distinctions,

                    		
                  

                  

                    506
                    !
                    
                      
    "invited-positions" = orcid_invited_positions,

                    		
                  

                  

                    507
                    !
                    
                      
    "memberships" = orcid_memberships,

                    		
                  

                  

                    508
                    !
                    
                      
    "qualifications" = orcid_qualifications,

                    		
                  

                  

                    509
                    !
                    
                      
    "services" = orcid_services,

                    		
                  

                  

                    510
                    !
                    
                      
    "research-resources" = orcid_research_resources,

                    		
                  

                  

                    511
                    !
                    
                      
    "works" = orcid_works,

                    		
                  

                  

                    512
                    !
                    
                      
    "funding" = orcid_funding,

                    		
                  

                  

                    513
                    !
                    
                      
    "peer-reviews" = orcid_peer_reviews

                    		
                  

                  

                    514
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    515
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    516
                    
                    
                      
  # Fetch data for each ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    517
                    !
                    
                      
  results <- lapply(orcid_ids, function(orcid_id) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    518
                    !
                    
                      
    tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    519
                    
                    
                      
      {

                    		
                  

                  

                    520
                    !
                    
                      
        fetch_fn(orcid_id, token = token)

                    		
                  

                  

                    521
                    
                    
                      
      },

                    		
                  

                  

                    522
                    !
                    
                      
      error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    523
                    !
                    
                      
        msg <- paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    524
                    !
                    
                      
          "Failed to fetch ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    525
                    !
                    
                      
          section,

                    		
                  

                  

                    526
                    !
                    
                      
          " for ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    527
                    !
                    
                      
          orcid_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    528
                    
                    
                      
          ": ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    529
                    !
                    
                      
          conditionMessage(e)

                    		
                  

                  

                    530
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    531
                    !
                    
                      
        if (stop_on_error) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    532
                    !
                    
                      
          stop(msg, call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    533
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    534
                    !
                    
                      
        warning(msg, call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    535
                    !
                    
                      
        NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    536
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    537
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    538
                    
                    
                      
  })

                    		
                  

                  

                    539
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    540
                    
                    
                      
  # Remove NULL results (failed requests)

                    		
                  

                  

                    541
                    !
                    
                      
  results <- results[!vapply(results, is.null, logical(1))]

                    		
                  

                  

                    542
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    543
                    !
                    
                      
  if (length(results) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    544
                    !
                    
                      
    warning("No data retrieved for any ORCID", call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    545
                    !
                    
                      
    return(data.table::data.table())

                    		
                  

                  

                    546
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    547
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    548
                    
                    
                      
  # Combine results

                    		
                  

                  

                    549
                    !
                    
                      
  data.table::rbindlist(results, fill = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    550
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve funding records from ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches funding records for a given ORCID identifier from the ORCID public API.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' Returns a structured data.table with funding details including grant titles,

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' funding organizations, amounts, and dates.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. A valid ORCID identifier in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for authenticated

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   requests. If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   Most public data is accessible without authentication.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table with the following columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{orcid}{ORCID identifier}

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{put_code}{Unique identifier for this funding record}

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{title}{Title of the funded project}

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{type}{Type of funding (e.g., grant, contract, award)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{organization}{Name of the funding organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{start_date}{Funding start date (ISO format)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{end_date}{Funding end date (ISO format)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{amount}{Funding amount (if available)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{currency}{Currency code (e.g., USD, EUR)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   Returns an empty data.table with the same structure if no funding

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   records are found.

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID public API endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/{orcid-id}/fundings}

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' The function respects ORCID API rate limits and includes appropriate

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' User-Agent headers identifying the orcidtr package.

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_works}}, \code{\link{orcid_employments}}, \code{\link{orcid_fetch_record}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch funding records for a public ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' funding <- orcid_funding("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' print(funding)

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' # With authentication

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' Sys.setenv(ORCID_TOKEN = "your-token-here")

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' funding <- orcid_funding("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
orcid_funding <- function(orcid_id, token = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    1x
                    
                      
  fetch_and_parse("fundings", orcid_id, parse_funding, token)

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Internal HTTP request handler for ORCID API

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Makes HTTP requests to the ORCID public API with proper headers, error

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' handling, and JSON parsing. Authentication is optional - the public API

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' works without any token for reading public data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param endpoint Character string. API endpoint path (e.g., "employments").

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. Valid ORCID identifier.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for higher rate

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   limits or accessing private data (if granted). If NULL, no authentication

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   is used. The public API does not require authentication.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param base_url Character string. Base URL for ORCID API.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Parsed JSON response as an R list.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
orcid_request <- function(

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
  endpoint,

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
  orcid_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
  token = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
  base_url = "https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0"

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  # For public API, don't automatically use ORCID_TOKEN from environment

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
  # Public API endpoints don't require authentication and sending an invalid

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
  # token will cause a 401 error. Only use token if explicitly provided.

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
  # Note: Member API (api.orcid.org) would require authentication.

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
  # Construct full URL

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    !
                    
                      
  url <- paste0(base_url, "/", orcid_id, "/", endpoint)

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
  # Build request

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    !
                    
                      
  req <- httr2::request(url) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    !
                    
                      
    httr2::req_headers(

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    !
                    
                      
      Accept = "application/json",

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    !
                    
                      
      `User-Agent` = paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    !
                    
                      
        "orcidtr/",

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    !
                    
                      
        utils::packageVersion("orcidtr"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    !
                    
                      
        " (R package; https://github.com/lorenzoFabbri/orcidtr)"

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
  # Add authentication if token is explicitly provided

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(token) && nchar(token) > 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    !
                    
                      
    req <- req |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    !
                    
                      
      httr2::req_headers(Authorization = paste("Bearer", token))

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
  # Perform request with error handling

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    !
                    
                      
  resp <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
    {

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    !
                    
                      
      req |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    !
                    
                      
        httr2::req_retry(max_tries = 3, max_seconds = 10) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    !
