        httr2::req_error(is_error = function(resp) FALSE) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    !
                    
                      
        httr2::req_perform()

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    !
                    
                      
    error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    !
                    
                      
      stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    !
                    
                      
        "Failed to connect to ORCID API: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    !
                    
                      
        conditionMessage(e),

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    !
                    
                      
        call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
  # Check for HTTP errors

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    !
                    
                      
  status <- httr2::resp_status(resp)

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    !
                    
                      
  if (status == 404) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    !
                    
                      
    stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    !
                    
                      
      "ORCID record not found or endpoint does not exist: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    !
                    
                      
      orcid_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
      "/",

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    !
                    
                      
      endpoint,

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    !
                    
                      
      call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    !
                    
                      
  if (status == 401) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    !
                    
                      
    stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    !
                    
                      
      "Authentication failed. ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
      "The public API does not require authentication. ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    !
                    
                      
      "If you provided a token, it may be invalid or for the member API.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    !
                    
                      
      call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    !
                    
                      
  if (status == 429) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
    stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
      "Rate limit exceeded. Please wait before making more requests.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    !
                    
                      
      call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    !
                    
                      
  if (status >= 400) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    !
                    
                      
    stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    !
                    
                      
      "ORCID API request failed with status ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
      status,

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
      ": ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    !
                    
                      
      httr2::resp_status_desc(resp),

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    !
                    
                      
      call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
  # Parse JSON response

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    !
                    
                      
  tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
    {

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    !
                    
                      
      body <- httr2::resp_body_string(resp)

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    !
                    
                      
      jsonlite::fromJSON(body, simplifyVector = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    !
                    
                      
    error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    !
                    
                      
      stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    !
                    
                      
        "Failed to parse ORCID API response: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    !
                    
                      
        conditionMessage(e),

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    !
                    
                      
        call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' Get ORCID API base URL

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#' Returns the base URL for the ORCID public API. Can be overridden

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#' with ORCID_API_URL environment variable for testing.

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Character string with base URL.

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
orcid_base_url <- function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    !
                    
                      
  url <- Sys.getenv("ORCID_API_URL", unset = "")

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    !
                    
                      
  if (url == "") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    !
                    
                      
    return("https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0")

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    !
                    
                      
  url

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#' Check ORCID API status

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#' Checks the health and availability of the ORCID public API. Useful for

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#' diagnostics and ensuring the API is accessible before making requests.

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Character string with API status message (typically "OK" if healthy)

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID API status endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/status}

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#' # Check API status

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#' status <- orcid_ping()

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#' print(status)

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
orcid_ping <- function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
  # Construct URL

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    !
                    
                      
  url <- paste0(orcid_base_url(), "/status")

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
  # Build request with JSON response

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    !
                    
                      
  req <- httr2::request(url) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    !
                    
                      
    httr2::req_headers(

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    !
                    
                      
      Accept = "application/json",

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    !
                    
                      
      `User-Agent` = paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    !
                    
                      
        "orcidtr/",

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    !
                    
                      
        utils::packageVersion("orcidtr"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    !
                    
                      
        " (R package; https://github.com/lorenzoFabbri/orcidtr)"

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
  # Perform request

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    !
                    
                      
  resp <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
    {

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    !
                    
                      
      req |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    !
                    
                      
        httr2::req_retry(max_tries = 3, max_seconds = 10) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    !
                    
                      
        httr2::req_error(is_error = function(resp) FALSE) |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    !
                    
                      
        httr2::req_perform()

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    !
                    
                      
    error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    !
                    
                      
      stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    !
                    
                      
        "Failed to connect to ORCID API status endpoint: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    !
                    
                      
        conditionMessage(e),

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    !
                    
                      
        call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
  # Check status

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    !
                    
                      
  status <- httr2::resp_status(resp)

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    !
                    
                      
  if (status != 200) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("ORCID API status check failed with status ", status, call. = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
  # Parse JSON response

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    !
                    
                      
  json_data <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
    {

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    !
                    
                      
      body <- httr2::resp_body_string(resp)

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    !
                    
                      
      jsonlite::fromJSON(body, simplifyVector = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    !
                    
                      
    error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    !
                    
                      
      stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    !
                    
                      
        "Failed to parse ORCID API status response: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    !
                    
                      
        conditionMessage(e),

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    !
                    
                      
        call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
  # Extract tomcatUp status

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    !
                    
                      
  tomcat_up <- safe_extract(json_data, "tomcatUp")

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    !
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(tomcat_up)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    !
                    
                      
    return("OK")

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    !
                    
                      
    return(paste("Status:", tomcat_up))

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve distinctions from ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches distinction records (awards, honors, recognitions) for an ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' identifier. Returns structured data similar to employments and educations.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. A valid ORCID identifier in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for authenticated

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   requests. If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table with the following columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{orcid}{ORCID identifier}

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{put_code}{Unique identifier for this distinction record}

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{organization}{Name of the awarding organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{department}{Department name (if available)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{role}{Award or distinction title}

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{start_date}{Award/distinction date (ISO format)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{end_date}{End date (ISO format, if applicable)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{city}{City of organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{region}{State/region of organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{country}{Country of organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   Returns an empty data.table with the same structure if no distinction

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   records are found.

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID public API endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/{orcid-id}/distinctions}

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_employments}}, \code{\link{orcid_educations}}, \code{\link{orcid_activities}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch distinctions

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' distinctions <- orcid_distinctions("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' print(distinctions)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
orcid_distinctions <- function(orcid_id, token = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    1x
                    
                      
  fetch_and_parse(

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    1x
                    
                      
    "distinctions",

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    1x
                    
                      
    orcid_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    1x
                    
                      
    parse_affiliations,

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    1x
                    
                      
    token

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve invited positions from ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches invited position records for an ORCID identifier, such as

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#' visiting professorships, guest lectureships, etc.

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. A valid ORCID identifier in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for authenticated

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#'   requests. If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table with the following columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{orcid}{ORCID identifier}

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{put_code}{Unique identifier for this invited position record}

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{organization}{Name of the hosting organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{department}{Department name (if available)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{role}{Position title}

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{start_date}{Position start date (ISO format)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{end_date}{Position end date (ISO format)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{city}{City of organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{region}{State/region of organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{country}{Country of organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#'   Returns an empty data.table with the same structure if no invited position

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#'   records are found.

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID public API endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/{orcid-id}/invited-positions}

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_employments}}, \code{\link{orcid_activities}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch invited positions

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#' positions <- orcid_invited_positions("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#' print(positions)

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
orcid_invited_positions <- function(orcid_id, token = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    1x
                    
                      
  fetch_and_parse(

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    1x
                    
                      
    "invited-positions",

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    1x
                    
                      
    orcid_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    1x
                    
                      
    parse_affiliations,

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    1x
                    
                      
    token

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve memberships from ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches professional membership records for an ORCID identifier, such as

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#' memberships in professional societies, organizations, etc.

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. A valid ORCID identifier in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for authenticated

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#'   requests. If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table with the following columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{orcid}{ORCID identifier}

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{put_code}{Unique identifier for this membership record}

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{organization}{Name of the organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{department}{Department name (if available)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{role}{Membership role or title}

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{start_date}{Membership start date (ISO format)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{end_date}{Membership end date (ISO format)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{city}{City of organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{region}{State/region of organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{country}{Country of organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
#'   Returns an empty data.table with the same structure if no membership

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
#'   records are found.

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID public API endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/{orcid-id}/memberships}

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_employments}}, \code{\link{orcid_activities}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch memberships

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#' memberships <- orcid_memberships("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#' print(memberships)

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
orcid_memberships <- function(orcid_id, token = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    1x
                    
                      
  fetch_and_parse(

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    1x
                    
                      
    "memberships",

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    1x
                    
                      
    orcid_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    1x
                    
                      
    parse_affiliations,

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    1x
                    
                      
    token

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve qualifications from ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches professional qualification records for an ORCID identifier, such as

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
#' licenses, certifications, etc.

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. A valid ORCID identifier in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for authenticated

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
#'   requests. If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table with the following columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{orcid}{ORCID identifier}

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{put_code}{Unique identifier for this qualification record}

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{organization}{Name of the issuing organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{department}{Department name (if available)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{role}{Qualification title}

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{start_date}{Qualification date (ISO format)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{end_date}{Expiration date (ISO format, if applicable)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{city}{City of organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{region}{State/region of organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{country}{Country of organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
#'   Returns an empty data.table with the same structure if no qualification

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
#'   records are found.

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID public API endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/{orcid-id}/qualifications}

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_educations}}, \code{\link{orcid_activities}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch qualifications

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
#' qualifications <- orcid_qualifications("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
#' print(qualifications)

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
orcid_qualifications <- function(orcid_id, token = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    1x
                    
                      
  fetch_and_parse(

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    1x
                    
                      
    "qualifications",

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    1x
                    
                      
    orcid_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    1x
                    
                      
    parse_affiliations,

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    1x
                    
                      
    token

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve services from ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches service activity records for an ORCID identifier, such as

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
#' committee memberships, editorial board positions, peer review activities, etc.

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. A valid ORCID identifier in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for authenticated

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    
                    
                      
#'   requests. If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table with the following columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{orcid}{ORCID identifier}

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{put_code}{Unique identifier for this service record}

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{organization}{Name of the organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{department}{Department name (if available)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{role}{Service role or title}

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{start_date}{Service start date (ISO format)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{end_date}{Service end date (ISO format)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{city}{City of organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{region}{State/region of organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{country}{Country of organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    
                    
                      
#'   Returns an empty data.table with the same structure if no service

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    
                    
                      
#'   records are found.

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID public API endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/{orcid-id}/services}

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_peer_reviews}}, \code{\link{orcid_activities}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch services

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    
                    
                      
#' services <- orcid_services("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    
                    
                      
#' print(services)

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    
                    
                      
orcid_services <- function(orcid_id, token = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    1x
                    
                      
  fetch_and_parse(

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    1x
                    
                      
    "services",

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    1x
                    
                      
    orcid_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    1x
                    
                      
    parse_affiliations,

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    1x
                    
                      
    token

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
