  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve research resources from ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches research resource records for an ORCID identifier, such as

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    
                    
                      
#' facilities, equipment, databases, collections, etc.

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. A valid ORCID identifier in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for authenticated

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    
                    
                      
#'   requests. If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table with the following columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{orcid}{ORCID identifier}

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{put_code}{Unique identifier for this resource record}

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{title}{Resource title/name}

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{hosts}{Hosting organizations (comma-separated)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{start_date}{Resource start date (ISO format)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{end_date}{Resource end date (ISO format)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    
                    
                      
#'   Returns an empty data.table with the same structure if no research

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    
                    
                      
#'   resource records are found.

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID public API endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    301
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/{orcid-id}/research-resources}

                    		
                  

                  

                    302
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    303
                    
                    
                      
#' Note: Research resources have a different structure than other affiliations,

                    		
                  

                  

                    304
                    
                    
                      
#' with a focus on the resource itself rather than organizational affiliations.

                    		
                  

                  

                    305
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    306
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    307
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    308
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    309
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    310
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_works}}, \code{\link{orcid_activities}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    311
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    312
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    313
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    314
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch research resources

                    		
                  

                  

                    315
                    
                    
                      
#' resources <- orcid_research_resources("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    316
                    
                    
                      
#' print(resources)

                    		
                  

                  

                    317
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    318
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    319
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    320
                    
                    
                      
orcid_research_resources <- function(orcid_id, token = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    321
                    1x
                    
                      
  fetch_and_parse(

                    		
                  

                  

                    322
                    1x
                    
                      
    "research-resources",

                    		
                  

                  

                    323
                    1x
                    
                      
    orcid_id,

                    		
                  

                  

                    324
                    1x
                    
                      
    parse_research_resources,

                    		
                  

                  

                    325
                    1x
                    
                      
    token

                    		
                  

                  

                    326
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    327
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve works (publications) from ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches work records (publications, datasets, preprints, etc.) for a given

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID identifier from the ORCID public API. Returns a structured data.table

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' with work details including titles, types, DOIs, and publication dates.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. A valid ORCID identifier in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for authenticated

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   requests. If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   Most public data is accessible without authentication.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table with the following columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{orcid}{ORCID identifier}

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{put_code}{Unique identifier for this work record}

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{title}{Title of the work}

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{type}{Type of work (e.g., journal-article, dataset, preprint)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{publication_date}{Publication date (ISO format)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{journal}{Journal or venue name (if available)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{doi}{Digital Object Identifier (if available)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{url}{URL to the work (if available)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   Returns an empty data.table with the same structure if no works are found.

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID public API endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/{orcid-id}/works}

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' Works can include journal articles, books, datasets, conference papers,

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' preprints, posters, and other scholarly outputs. The type field indicates

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' the specific category of each work.

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' The function respects ORCID API rate limits and includes appropriate

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' User-Agent headers identifying the orcidtr package.

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_employments}}, \code{\link{orcid_funding}}, \code{\link{orcid_fetch_record}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch works for a public ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' works <- orcid_works("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' print(works)

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' # Filter by type

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' articles <- works[type == "journal-article"]

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' datasets <- works[type == "data-set"]

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' # With authentication

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' Sys.setenv(ORCID_TOKEN = "your-token-here")

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' works <- orcid_works("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
orcid_works <- function(orcid_id, token = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    2x
                    
                      
  fetch_and_parse("works", orcid_id, parse_works, token)

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve activities summary from ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches a comprehensive summary of all activities for an ORCID identifier

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' in a single API call. This is more efficient than calling individual

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' endpoints when you need multiple activity types.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. A valid ORCID identifier in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for authenticated

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   requests. If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A named list with data.table elements for each activity section:

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{distinctions}{Distinctions/awards summary}

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{educations}{Education history summary}

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{employments}{Employment history summary}

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{invited_positions}{Invited positions summary}

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{memberships}{Professional memberships summary}

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{qualifications}{Qualifications/licenses summary}

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{services}{Service activities summary}

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{fundings}{Funding records summary}

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{peer_reviews}{Peer review activities summary}

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{research_resources}{Research resources summary}

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{works}{Works/publications summary}

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   Empty data.tables are returned for sections with no data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID public API endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/{orcid-id}/activities}

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' This endpoint provides summary information for all activity types in a

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' single request, which is more efficient than making multiple individual

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' requests. However, the summaries contain less detail than the full

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' individual records.

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_fetch_record}}, \code{\link{orcid_person}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch all activities

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' activities <- orcid_activities("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' names(activities)

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' # Access specific sections

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' activities$works

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' activities$employments

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' activities$fundings

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
orcid_activities <- function(orcid_id, token = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    2x
                    
                      
  fetch_and_parse("activities", orcid_id, parse_activities, token)

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve employment history from ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches employment records for a given ORCID identifier from the ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' public API. Returns a structured data.table with employment history including

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' organization names, roles, departments, and dates.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. A valid ORCID identifier in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for authenticated

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   requests. If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   Most public data is accessible without authentication.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table with the following columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{orcid}{ORCID identifier}

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{put_code}{Unique identifier for this employment record}

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{organization}{Name of the employing organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{department}{Department name (if available)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{role}{Job title or role}

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{start_date}{Employment start date (ISO format)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{end_date}{Employment end date (ISO format, NA if current)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{city}{City of organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{region}{State/region of organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{country}{Country of organization}

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   Returns an empty data.table with the same structure if no employment

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   records are found.

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID public API endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/{orcid-id}/employments}

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' The function respects ORCID API rate limits and includes appropriate

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' User-Agent headers identifying the orcidtr package.

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_educations}}, \code{\link{orcid_works}}, \code{\link{orcid_fetch_record}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch employment history for a public ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' emp <- orcid_employments("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' print(emp)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' # With authentication

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' Sys.setenv(ORCID_TOKEN = "your-token-here")

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' emp <- orcid_employments("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
orcid_employments <- function(orcid_id, token = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    4x
                    
                      
  fetch_and_parse("employments", orcid_id, parse_employments, token)

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Retrieve education history from ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Fetches education records for a given ORCID identifier from the ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' public API. Returns a structured data.table with education history including

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' institutions, degrees, departments, and dates.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param orcid_id Character string. A valid ORCID identifier in the format

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX. Can also handle URLs like https://orcid.org/XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param token Character string or NULL. Optional API token for authenticated

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   requests. If NULL (default), checks the ORCID_TOKEN environment variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   Most public data is accessible without authentication.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data.table with the following columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   \describe{

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{orcid}{ORCID identifier}

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{put_code}{Unique identifier for this education record}

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{organization}{Name of the educational institution}

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{department}{Department name (if available)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{role}{Degree or program name}

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{start_date}{Education start date (ISO format)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{end_date}{Education end date (ISO format)}

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{city}{City of institution}

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{region}{State/region of institution}

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'     \item{country}{Country of institution}

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   }

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   Returns an empty data.table with the same structure if no education

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   records are found.

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' This function queries the ORCID public API endpoint:

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{https://pub.orcid.org/v3.0/{orcid-id}/educations}

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' The function respects ORCID API rate limits and includes appropriate

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' User-Agent headers identifying the orcidtr package.

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' ORCID API Documentation: \url{https://info.orcid.org/documentation/api-tutorials/}

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{\link{orcid_employments}}, \code{\link{orcid_works}}, \code{\link{orcid_fetch_record}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' # Fetch education history for a public ORCID

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' edu <- orcid_educations("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' print(edu)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' # With authentication

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' Sys.setenv(ORCID_TOKEN = "your-token-here")

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' edu <- orcid_educations("0000-0002-1825-0097")

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    54

                    55
